This is a list of some of the lab related coursework.

Fall 2024 – Spring 2025

Fall 2024 – Spring 2025. CSc 59866/7 Capstone I/II: BEAT+: Adding Branding and Entrepreneurship for Real-World Applications Using Emerging Technologies: AI, AR, AT, and Apps,  The City College of New York. Fall 2024  CSC 59866 Capstone I Class Meet Time & Location:  Tuesday 11:00AM – 01:30PM [In-Person Location: NAC 5/142] [For some reviews and presentations: Zoom Link (passcode will be sent via email)]

Fall 2024, CSC I6716 – 2RR (30128)  Computer Vision,  Tuesday 4:50 – 7:20 PM, [In-Person Location: NAC 7/227] [Zoom Link for Presentations (passcode will be sent via email)], The City College of New York

Fall 2024, DSE I9800-4RR (32546) & DSE I9900-4RR (32547) Data Science and Engineering Master’s Capstone Project/Thesis, Thursday 4:50 – 7:20 pm, Hybrid Asynchronous: [In-Person Location: Shepard 20] [Zoom Link for Presentations] (passcode will be sent via email), The City College of New York. You may access the  DSE Capstone Project/Thesis Main Page for the current and past projects.
